title: sAminAthanadu
sahitya:
sAminAthanadu tiru nAmattin dhyAnam sakala vidhamAna perum sukhattinaiyum tarum


anupallavi

  nAmaNakka adaip-pOlum bhaktarukku kAma krOdham ODum kSEma lAbham kai kUDum


caraNam    kavalai enum pAzhum kaDal tanil mUzhgi tavikkAdu pizhaikkavE takka tuNaiyaLikkum
avadiyurum manadil amaidi nilai peravE Akkattaik-kUTTum Ukkattai UTTumE
